name: Astralith
aura: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 28%

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Fills the Turn Meter of a random ally by 15%. Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by a further 15% if this attack is critical.
Attacks 1 enemy. Places two [Bomb] debuffs that detonate after 1 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted.

[Active Effect] Exchanges remaining HP levels with a target enemy, then attacks with the default skill. Cannot be used on a Boss. [Passive Effect] Gains an Extra Turn and decreases the cooldown of this Skill by 3 turns if this Championâ€™s HP drops below 20% when attacked.
